name: Wholesome Fruit and Protein Bars
author: StephanieLyn
summary: These are a semi-quick and energy-packed healthy alternative to baked cookies and granola bars. They are very dense, but make a great treat to stick in a lunch box in small portions. This recipe requires a food processor, but a meat grinder will also do.
directions: Place peanuts in a food processor; pulse to the consistency of bread crumbs
Add oats; pulse just until mixed
Add raisins and dates and process just until mixed, scraping down sides as needed
Add coconut; process thoroughly until mixture is finely chopped
Press mixture into a round glass pie dish; refrigerate until set, 40 minutes to 1 hour
